key_features: 10X DBS Points per S$5 / 4 miles per S$1 on online purchases
3X DBS Points per S$5 / 1.2 miles per S$1 on overseas purchases
1X DBS Points per S$5 / 0.4 miles per S$1 on other purchases
Complimentary e-Commerce Protection on online purchases
Enjoy first year annual fee waiver

At MoneySmart, we strive to keep our information accurate and up to date. This information may be different from what you see when you visit a financial institution, service provider, or specific product site. MoneySmart shall not be liable to compensate the Customer should the information is not as updated as our Partner.
air_miles: 10X Points for online spend: Get up to 10 DBS Points (4 miles per S$1) on online transactions, capped at first S$2,000 eligible spend per calendar month.
overseas_spending: 3X DBS Points per S$5 / 1.2 miles per S$1 on overseas purchases
rewards: DBS Points earned in your first year expire in a year from card application. Subsequent DBS Points earned expire a year from earned date
online_shopping: 10X DBS Points per S$5 / 4 miles per S$1 on online purchases
Complimentary e-Commerce Protection on online purchases
shopping: 1X DBS Points per S$5 / 0.4 miles per S$1 on other purchases

fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.80% p.a. chargeable on daily basis (subject to compounding)
